{"id":1758886270,"question_id":3886,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"2 months, 2 weeks","timestamp":1756957215,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"297 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1758886270/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Count Number of Trapezoids I","memory":"255.2 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    const static int MOD = 1e9+7;\n    int countTrapezoids(vector<vector<int>>& points) {\n        unordered_map<int, vector<int>> m;\n        for (auto i : points) \n            m[i[1]].push_back(i[0]);\n        vector<int> ys;\n        for (auto [k, v] : m)\n            ys.push_back(k);\n        \n        long long ans = 0;\n        long long res = 0;\n        for (int i=0; i<(int)ys.size(); i++) {\n            int l1 = (int)m[ys[i]].size();\n            long long cl1 = l1 * 1LL * (l1-1) / 2;\n            ans = (ans + (cl1 * res)) % MOD;\n            res += cl1;\n        }\n        return (int)ans;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"count-number-of-trapezoids-i","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1,"frontend_id":1189}
